description: My place is close to Starbucks, Botanic Garden, Lula Bagel,Brooklyn Museum, 2,3,4,A,C train stations, Brooklyn Children's Museum. You’ll love my place because of The coziness, close proximity to art and cultural institutions , the comfy bed, the kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Cozy Brownstone Apartment in Brooklyn
review: The host canceled this reservation 52 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
